name: Мир Потерянных Надежд
description:
You play for Jax, and he has a daughter, Elay. One day you Wake up and see that Elay not, and, thinking that she was in the village, you go there...
P. S This game is a demo version and it is only the first Chapter, the remaining chapters are in development, and when all the chapters are completed, the game will be paid, the game will cost $ 1.30, this demo version of the game will still be free. (With the understanding of FPS STUDIO).
